summary: Completed E2E testing for US-9 'Load Saved Diagram for Editing' feature. All backend APIs (80 tests) passed. Frontend E2E flow verified: login, navigate to My Diagrams, click diagram card, load diagram in editor at /diagrams/:id URL, verify editing banner, update diagram, and confirm persistence.
critical_code_review_comments: DiagramRenderer.js line 90: useEffect dependency array includes BACKEND_URL but it's not used in the effect - consider removing or using it
Consider adding data-testid attributes to key interactive elements for better test automation (diagram cards, save button, update modal)
seed_data_creation: Created test user e2etest@example.com and test diagram 'E2E Test Flowchart' for E2E testing
context_for_next_testing_agent: US-9 Load Saved Diagram for Editing feature is fully implemented and tested. Test user e2etest@example.com exists with diagram 'E2E Test Flowchart - UPDATED V2'. All CRUD operations for diagrams work correctly. The DiagramRenderer component correctly fetches diagram by ID from URL params and populates the editor.

US-9_Load_Saved_Diagram.navigate_to_my_diagrams: PASS - After login, redirects to My Diagrams list
US-9_Load_Saved_Diagram.editor_shows_correct_data: PASS - Title, diagram type (GraphViz), and code loaded correctly
US-9_Load_Saved_Diagram.update_button_appears: PASS - Save button shows 'Update diagram' title in edit mode
